mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student ( id, name, gender, phone, email, year, create_date, status, department_id, major_id, cla_id, user_id ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE},#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{majorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{claId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: UPDATE student SET name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, major_id = #{majorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cla_id = #{claId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: -- SELECT -- t1.id, -- t1.NAME, -- t1.gender, -- t1.phone, -- t1.email, -- t1.department_id, -- t1.major_id, -- t1.cla_id, -- t2.department, -- t3.major, -- t4.cla -- FROM -- student t1 -- LEFT JOIN department t2 ON ( t1.department_id = t2.id ) -- LEFT JOIN major t3 ON ( t1.major_id = t3.id ) -- LEFT JOIN cla t4 ON ( t1.cla_id = t4.id ) -- WHERE -- t1.cla_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT cla_id FROM arrange_course WHERE teacher_id = #{teacherId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) SELECT DISTINCT t1.id, t1.NAME, t1.gender, t1.phone, t1.email, t1.department_id, t1.major_id, t1.cla_id, t2.department, t3.major, t4.cla FROM student t1 LEFT JOIN department t2 ON ( t1.department_id = t2.id ) LEFT JOIN major t3 ON ( t1.major_id = t3.id ) LEFT JOIN cla t4 ON ( t1.cla_id = t4.id ) LEFT JOIN arrange_course t5 ON ( t5.cla_id = t1.cla_id ) WHERE teacher_id = "${teacherId}"
